betterquesting.name: The Start of Something
betterquesting.desc:
§o"If I want to get anything done, I'll need a good place to work."§r

Build a crafting table from 4 wooden planks.

betterquesting.name: Better Tools
betterquesting.desc:
§o"These wooden tools won't last long. I should try to craft something a bit more sturdy."§r

Mine some cobblestone, then craft a stone axe, pickaxe, and sword.

betterquesting.name: Finding Shelter
betterquesting.desc:
§oThe monsters which roam these lands at night are relentless. I should find a place which I can stay for the night.§r

Check this box once you have some sort of shelter. It could be anything: a house, a cave, a hole in the ground, or some renovated ruins.

betterquesting.name: Nice and Cozy
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Now that I have some shelter, I should make it feel a bit more like home."§r

Complete this quest once you have a wooden chest, a crafting table, and some torches. Then, place them in your shelter.

betterquesting.name: Don't Starve
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I'm running low on provisions. I should set up a small farm so I can grow my own food."

§rIn order to set up a farm, you'll need water and tilled land. Craft a hoe, and obtain some seeds from breaking tall grass.

betterquesting.name: Meal Prep
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Now that I have everything I need, it's time to bring this meal plan to fruition."

§rUse a bucket to bring water to the spot where you would like your farm to be, then till the soil around it using the hoe. Plant your seeds and wait until they are fully grown. Finally, use 3 wheat to make bread.

betterquesting.name: Level Up
betterquesting.desc:
§o"In my travels I have come across lots of things I don't quite know how to use yet. I should put some of this "experience" I have been gaining towards being more skilled."

§rIn the inventory screen, click the "Skills" tab. Here, you can allocate XP levels towards gaining proficiency in different skills. Level up one of your skills and then check the box. Each first skill point costs 3 XP levels, and every point afterwards costs 1 more XP level than the last.

betterquesting.name: The Spice of Life
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Eating too much of the same thing isn't great for my health. I should try to diversify my diet."

§rCollect 1 of every kind of basic grow-able food item.

betterquesting.name: Flavortown
betterquesting.desc:
§o"With all this farm-fresh food I have, I could probably make something really tasty."

§rBake a cake.

betterquesting.name: Home on the Range
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Travelling these lands, I've seen lots of different animals. It would probably be useful to keep some on my farm."

§rBuild a lead, then bring home a fresian cow.

betterquesting.name: Cow Farmer
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Having a cow is great - now I have a permanant source of drinkable milk!"

§rCows eat wheat and grass, and require water to drink. Keep some cows well-fed and happy until you are able to milk them with a bucket. Then, craft the bucket in a crafting table with 3+ bottles to get drinkable bottles of milk.

Fresian Cows - 5 bottles/bucket
Holstein Cows - 5 bottles/bucket
Other Cows - 3 bottles/bucket
Sheep/Goats - 3 bottles/bucket

Different milks can also be made into cheese by placing them in a cheese mold.

betterquesting.name: Amateur Spelunker
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Even these stone tools are breaking pretty quickly. They also aren't very effective. Perhaps I can find a better material to make tools out of underground."

§rFind a cave, or start digging underground. Bring back some coal, copper ore, and iron ore.

betterquesting.name: A Real Upgrade
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Great! Now that I have some better raw materials, time to get to work making some better tools."

§rBuild a furnace and smelt your ore into ingots. Then, use your ingots to craft a copper pickaxe.

betterquesting.name: Defense Master
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Underground, iron is abundant, but monsters are rampant. A suit of iron armor would go a long way for my survivability."

§rCraft a full set of iron armor.

betterquesting.name: Getting Revenge
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Now that I'm properly armed, I feel more confident in my ability to fight the monsters. Time to take revenge for my friends!"

§rKill 10 zombies.

betterquesting.name: Exploratory Studies
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Dotted across the land, I have seen towers with staircases spiralling downward into darkness. From the black abyss, I hear the wails of an unimaginable number of monsters. Am I finally ready to take them on?"

§rFind a roguelike dungeon, and fight your way down in order to retrieve a §oLifeblood Crystal§r and raise your max health.

betterquesting.name: Arcane Arts
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Perhaps, now that I am more experienced, I will be able to read some of those arcane tomes I've been keeping in my pack?"

§rLevel up enough to read one of the guidebooks in your backpack, and begin your journey into the arcane. (then, check the box)

betterquesting.name: Road to Power
betterquesting.desc:
§o"With these advanced conductive metals, I could create the beginning of an electrical network. Finally, I can bring power to these untamed lands!"

§rCraft an engineer's hammer, then craft 4 LV wire coils and 4 LV wire connectors. Finally, craft a kinetic dynamo and a waterwheel.

betterquesting.name: Wealth From Below
betterquesting.desc:
§o"There is much more hidden underground than just Copper and Iron. I'm sure all of these metals will be useful at some point, so I should collect as much as I can."

§rMine tin, lead, silver, aluminum, nickel, and gold.

betterquesting.name: Experience Keeper
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I should probably use some of this... if I get knocked out in the wilds, I will probably lose experience. But... who knows what I might need it for!"

§rHave 30 levels of experience at once.

betterquesting.name: Quest for Commerce
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I have seen villages of traders before, and it's about time I located one. It would be useful to be able to barter for goods in this strange land."

§rFind a village, and meet a villager. Then, trade to aquire 3 emeralds.

betterquesting.name: Stored Power
betterquesting.desc:
§o"A villager taught me a trick to storing experience. By crafting 8 emeralds around an empty bottle, I can create usable bottles of stored experience."

§rCraft some bottles o' enchanting.

betterquesting.name: Pretty Blocks
betterquesting.desc:
§o§o"While looking at all these building blocks I've collected, a thought came to me. With a simple chisel, I could alter the look of these blocks to further decorate my home. Time to tap into my artistic side!"

§rCraft a chisel, and use the chisel inventory to turn stone brick into chiseled stone brick.

betterquesting.name: Home Furnishing
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Now that I have some pretty blocks, I should see about making some real furniture to spice up my home."

§rCraft a couch, an oak coffee table, and an oak bedside table.

betterquesting.name: Furniture Crafting
betterquesting.desc:
§o"There are some things I would like to make for my home, but do not have simple crafting recipes for. With a bit chisel, I can make my own furniture, stairs, blocks, anything - all with bits and pieces of other blocks."

§rCraft an iron bit chisel, then chisel some cobblestone.

betterquesting.name: Coastal Diet
betterquesting.desc:
§o"An quicker method of aquiring food just came to me. If I can craft a fishing rod, I could pull my meals straight out of the water!"

§rCraft a fishing rod, then fish up one of each kind of fish.

betterquesting.name: Sparkly, Shiny
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Rarely, I have found sparkling gemstones at the depths of the world. I'm sure I can put these exotic and valuable materials to good use, if I can find enough of them."

§rRetrieve 8 diamonds, 12 quartz, and 16 lapis lazuli, and 20 redstone dust.

betterquesting.name: Ranged Weaponry
betterquesting.desc:
§o"If I had a long-range weapon, I could take on the monsters with a lot less danger to myself. I should see about fashioning a bow and some arrows."

§rCraft a bow, and 16 arrows.

betterquesting.name: Experience Hoarder
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Jesus christ... why would anyone do this?"

§rHave 60 levels of experience at once.

betterquesting.name: Enchanted
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Apparently, there are ways to use experience aside from levelling up. A villager priest told me that, by using something called an enchantment altar, you can empower your tools and armor, at the cost of experience. I should look into this."

§rCraft an enchantment altar, and some bookshelves to strengthen it.

betterquesting.name: Kitchen Dreams
betterquesting.desc:
§o"If I had a proper kitchen like back home, I could prepare food with ease. I should see about assembling a food prep area in my home."

§rCraft the following pieces of a kitchen, then assemble a kitchen multiblock structure.

betterquesting.name: Outdoor Decor
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Now that the inside of my home looks nice, I should see about making the outside look more cozy as well."

§rCraft 8 stone paths, 1 bird bath, and 1 mailbox

betterquesting.name: Master Carpenter
betterquesting.desc:
§o"After delving into the art of bit chiseling, the need for more sophisticated chisel tools became apparent. Let me see about making something to help."

§rCraft a diamond chisel, diamond bit saw, and chiseled fluid tank.

betterquesting.name: Fermenting
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I have lots of great things to eat now, but what about to drink? I bet I could fashion a fermenting barrel and brew some tasty beverages from the comfort of my home."

§rCraft a fermenting barrel, and brew a bottle of ale.

betterquesting.name: Blast Oven
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I recall the industrial complexes of the cities back home. Massive brick ovens fired coal into coke, producing an oil that was used to treat wood. Perhaps I can replicate this."

§rCraft an engineer's hammer, then make 27 coke brick blocks. Assemble the blocks into a 3x3x3 structure and hit the front with your hammer to create a coke oven. Using this oven, create coal coke and a bucket of creosote oil.

betterquesting.name: Alchemist Apprentice
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Back home, I recall alchemists' shops in the city. Shimmering potions filled the displays in the front windows, but they were always exorbitantly priced. With proper brewing materials from the Nether, I could get a leg up on the monsters."

§rCraft a brewing stand, then brew a potion of healing with a water bottle + nether wart + glistening melon.

betterquesting.name: Master Alchemist
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I'm getting better at alchemy, but there are many potions I have left to discover."

§rBrew the 10 potions shown on the right. 
(Take note, some are enhanced potions with longer or stronger effects)

betterquesting.name: Eradication
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I've gained a bit of combat experience fighting those zombies. Perhaps I could take care on some tougher foes now?"

§rSlay 25 skeletons, 20 spiders, and 10 creepers.

betterquesting.name: Alternative Medicine
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Some alchemists brewed potions called elixirs, made from more natural and commonly found materials. These elixirs, unlike standard potions, can stack up to 16. Having this skill would be useful."

§rCraft an alchemic condenser and two alchemic retorts. Assemble the condenser by placing the condenser body with two retorts on either side. Finally, brew an elixir of speed and an elixir of instant health.

betterquesting.name: Automation
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Some tasks, like moving ore into and out of my furnace, are becoming increasingly tedious. I should devise a way to automate this."

§rCraft 2 hoppers and 2 chests. Place one hopper facing into the top of your furnace, and place a chest on top of that hopper. Then, place another hopper directly below your furnace, with this hopper facing into another chest.

Now, if provided with fuel, any materials put in the top chest will be brought down into the furnace, cooked, and spit out into the bottom chest. Check the box once you have done this.

betterquesting.name: Framed Blocks
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I can't seem to make stairs or slopes out of every kind of block. Maybe I can find a way around this."

§rCraft 8 framed blocks. These can be filled with other kinds of blocks in order to make any variety of stairs, slopes, walls, or slabs you could want.

betterquesting.name: Magical Botany
betterquesting.desc:
§o"This book is a botanist's guide to the flora of these lands. The sparkling flowers I've seen have powerful arcane properties. I should see about harnessing them."

§rCollect red, yellow, and blue magical flowers and turn them into petals. Then, craft a petal apothecary.

betterquesting.name: From the Stars
betterquesting.desc:
§o"The journal explains that the arcane and the cosmos are one, and with the right focusing tools, the power of the stars can be channelled. It also explains that the marble structures I've seen are observatories left behind by astral mages of the past."

§rGather 1 aquamarine, and unlock the secrets of a large marble observatory. Craft a resonating wand.

betterquesting.name: Druidity
betterquesting.desc:
§o"This tome details an ancient druidic art called Herblore. Power can be drawn from the land itself, by way of various rituals. The standing stone circles I've seen are actually moonlit altars used in this form of magic."

§rCraft a mortar and pestle. Then, locate a moonlight circle  and perform a ritual of wildroot growth.

betterquesting.name: Dwarven Magic
betterquesting.desc:
§o"The stone tablet describes a great power which lies far beneath the earth. Ember, as the codex refers to it, can be harnessed and used for a great variety of practical functions."

§rCraft a tinker's hammer. Then, craft an atmospheric gague. Lastly, craft an ember bore.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Medicine
betterquesting.desc:
§o"With new materials from the Nether, I think I can come up with some improvements to my old alchemy station."

§rCraft an advanced alchemy condenser and 2 advanced retorts. Then, craft an elixir of iron skin and an elixir of health boost.

betterquesting.name: Ultimate Pickaxe
betterquesting.desc:
§o"I've mined a lot of things now, but a better tool would be nice. The best miners from back home used tools made of pure diamond crystal. It sounds expensive, but such a tool could cut through anything with ease. I should get my hands on one."

§rCraft a diamond pickaxe.

betterquesting.name: Gateway to Hell
betterquesting.desc:
§o"With my shiny new pickaxe, I can finally mine obsidian, the jet black stones that form when lava and water meet. This stone has infamous occult properties. The knowledge of how to enter the underworld is commonplace, but it's practice is forbidden. Do I dare build the gateway and enter?"

§rGather 14 obsidian. Craft a vertical ring of obsidian blocks with a 2x3 width/height opening or larger. Then, light the bottom blocks of the opening with flint and steel. Lastly, enter the Nether.

betterquesting.name: Skeleton Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 75 Skeletons

betterquesting.name: Creeper Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 35 Creepers

betterquesting.name: Spider Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 75 Spiders

betterquesting.name: Zombie Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 100 Zombies

betterquesting.name: Lord of Decay
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Those charred black skeletons hold a dangerous secret. With 3 of their skulls and a bit of soul sand, I think I could summon something..."

§rCollect 3 wither skeleton skulls. Then, fight and defeat the Wither.

betterquesting.name: Demon Slayer
betterquesting.desc:
§o"The denizens of this place are ruthless and tough to kill, but perhaps I can find some use for thier loot."

§rKill 10 blazes, 10 magma cubes, and 5 wraiths.

betterquesting.name: Portable Naps
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Sometimes, while I'm exploring, I still want to pass some time. A sleepig bag would be perfect for this!"

§rCraft a sleeping bag.

betterquesting.name: Healthy
betterquesting.desc:
§o"Consuming the lifeheart crystal made me feel a lot healthier. I should try to find more of these."

§rMax out your health by using 5 lifeheart crystals.

betterquesting.name: By Air
betterquesting.desc: Craft a grappling hook and a hang glider.

betterquesting.name: Instant Travel
betterquesting.desc: Craft a waystone.

betterquesting.name: Mountain Scaler
betterquesting.desc: Craft a hookshot.

betterquesting.name: Leaps and Bounds
betterquesting.desc: Craft an ender staff.

betterquesting.name: Extreme Traveller
betterquesting.desc: Craft a magnetic repeller, and a pair of long-fall boots.

betterquesting.name: To the Skies
betterquesting.desc: Aquire an elytra.

betterquesting.name: Mastery of Air
betterquesting.desc: Craft the Rending Gale.

betterquesting.name: High-Speed Glider
betterquesting.desc: Craft an advanced hang-glider.

betterquesting.name: Unlimited Flight
betterquesting.desc:
Combine all 3 methods of flight into one.

§l§cTHIS WILL CONSUME YOUR ITEMS

betterquesting.name: Mansion Raider
betterquesting.desc: Find a forest mansion, defeat the inhabitants, and aquire a totem of undying.

betterquesting.name: Oceanic Temple
betterquesting.desc: Find an ocean monument, and slay the elder guardian.

betterquesting.name: Stronghold
betterquesting.desc: Find a stronghold, activate the ender portal, and travel to the end.

betterquesting.name: By Sea
betterquesting.desc: Craft and use a boat.

betterquesting.name: By Land
betterquesting.desc: Find a draft stallion and ride it using a riding crop.

betterquesting.name: Dragon Slayer
betterquesting.desc: Kill the Ender Dragon and collect its egg.

betterquesting.name: Geared Up
betterquesting.desc: Craft a diamond sword, shield, and a full set of diamond armor.

betterquesting.name: Eldritch City
betterquesting.desc: Raid an end city.

betterquesting.name: Super Sailor
betterquesting.desc: Craft a motorboat.

betterquesting.name: Zombie Pigman Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 50 Zombie Pigmen

betterquesting.name: Blaze Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 50 Blazes

betterquesting.name: Magma Cube Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 50 Magma Cubes

betterquesting.name: Enderman Slayer
betterquesting.desc: §lHunt 25 Endermen

betterquesting.name: Chicken Keeper
betterquesting.desc:
Chickens eat seeds, and require a pool of water to drink from. Seeds can be placed on the ground, where chickens will peck at it. Seeds can also be placed directly from a hopper or dropper.

Hens need nests in which to lay their eggs. Eggs will become fertilized and hatch into baby chicks if a Rooster is nearby. Chickens of any sort will shed feathers over time.

Craft a nest, then collect 3 eggs and 5 feathers.

betterquesting.name: Sheep Herder
betterquesting.desc:
Sheep will graze for grass, flowers, and some crops. They will eat wheat from a trough and need water to drink.

Adult sheep can be sheared for wool. If a ewe has given birth, it can also be milked for sheep milk. Gather both white and black wool, and a bucket of sheep milk.

betterquesting.name: Pig Wrangler
betterquesting.desc:
Pigs like to eat slop, carrots, beets, and potatoes, and also need water to drink. They love having mud to roll around in to be happy. Craft some mud and a bucket of slop.

Pigs, like all animals, can be killed for their meat. Pigs will also dig up truffles periodically if taken into a forest biome. You can walk a pig on a lead through a forest, or place a pen there. Gather 1 truffle.

Pigs can also be ridden using a carrot on a stick.

betterquesting.name: Super Omelette
betterquesting.desc: Craft a §o§lSuper Omelette

betterquesting.name: Getting Established
betterquesting.desc: §r§o"If I want to survive out here, there are some things I'll need to do to stay safe."

betterquesting.name: Farmer's Life
betterquesting.desc: §o"If I am to live in the wilderness, I'm going to need to make my own food."

betterquesting.name: Comfy Living
betterquesting.desc: §o"Having a nice home could keep my morale up. And maybe I'll run into someone else stranded here?"

betterquesting.name: Into the Mines
betterquesting.desc: §o"The caves beneath the surface are rich with valuable metal. I will put this to use."

betterquesting.name: The Arcane
betterquesting.desc: §o"This land is brimming with magic, the likes of which I've never seen before."

betterquesting.name: Age of Technology
betterquesting.desc: §o"With a wealth of metals at my fingertips, my technology is advancing each day."

betterquesting.name: The Bounty Board
betterquesting.desc: §lRepeatable quests for extra XP

betterquesting.name: Adventuring
betterquesting.desc: §o"There is lots to see in this world. Exploring, while dangerous, will surely help me get ahead."

betterquesting.name: Travelling
betterquesting.desc: §o"Getting from place to place just takes too long. I should see about finding an easier way."
